SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.network.socket

Class GameListenerClientSocket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.network.socket.GameListenerClientSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameListener, Serializable, Remote
public class GameListenerClientSocket extends Object implements GameListener, Serializable
The GameListenerClientSocket class implements the GameListener interface and handles communication with the client via socket by sending messages.
See Also:
